summary: Upgrade “WishMint AI” into a premium, viral, emotional birthday wish generator with a professional startup SaaS feel: improved hero UX (animated tagline, demo preview, trust badges), richer generator controls (wish length + emoji level), enhanced output cards (copy + share), template studio with downloadable posters, examples by category, feature-explanation + testimonials sections, social viral tools (WhatsApp, Instagram story format, QR codes), SEO meta tags, and a relaxed auth model where users can generate their first wish without login (login only for saving and premium/advanced features).
architectural_notes: Single-file offline-first implementation: all HTML/CSS/JS in one index.html; template-based text generation (no external APIs/keys).
Use wa.me URL with encodeURIComponent for WhatsApp sharing.
Use HTML canvas rendering for downloadable share card images.

Google Sign-In/OAuth requires external network access and third-party integration; this may conflict with fully offline-first/no-external-dependency goals and needs an explicit decision on allowed online-only features.
Relax gated UX flow: generation is allowed without login; only saving, premium template exports, and advanced features require authentication.
Add QR code generation locally (client-side) with no external API dependencies to preserve offline-friendly behavior.
Add SEO meta tags (title/description) directly in index.html head.
known_issues: Deployment/build error encountered when attempting to push/deploy the app to the network.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page React UI for “WishMint AI” with a premium dark theme and neon gradient accents (purple + green), using clean typography, rounded cards, subtle shadows, smooth spacing, and mobile-first responsive layout suitable for India audiences on phones and desktop.
Implement minimal premium animations for key section reveals and interactions (fade/slide), ensuring animations are subtle and do not block interaction or significantly impact performance.

Add a Hero section with title “WishMint AI”, subtitle “Make birthdays feel personal in seconds.”, and two CTAs: primary “Generate Wish” (scrolls/focuses generator) and secondary “See Examples” (scrolls to examples/gallery).

Build the core Generator section with the specified inputs: Name (required), Your name (optional), Relationship dropdown (friend, best friend, mom, dad, brother, sister, girlfriend, boyfriend, crush, teacher, colleague), Tone dropdown (emotional, funny, romantic, formal, short & sweet, light roast), Language dropdown (English, Hinglish, Hindi), Personality dropdown (kind, fun, hardworking, cute, savage, supportive, creative, introvert), and an optional memory textarea labeled “Add 1 personal memory line (optional)”.

Add generator actions: “Generate”, “Surprise Me (randomize)”, “Copy All”, and “Share on WhatsApp”. Implement basic validation so Generate/Copy/Share requires Name; show a clear inline error when missing.

Implement template-based (non-AI) “Birthday Pack” generation on the client with modular JavaScript/TypeScript functions. Generation must produce 5 outputs: Main Wish, WhatsApp Short, Instagram Caption, Mini Speech (targeting 10–15s spoken length), and Hashtags, varying based on relationship, tone, language, personality, and optional memory line.

Create an Output section that displays 5 output cards titled: “Main Wish”, “WhatsApp Short”, “Instagram Caption”, “Mini Speech (10–15s)”, and “Hashtags”. Each card must include a “Copy” button that copies only that card’s content.

Implement “Download as Card Image” that renders a shareable card using HTML canvas (no external API keys). The exported image must include: WishMint AI branding, selected template style, and the generated Main Wish (and optionally recipient name). Allow downloading as a PNG file.
Add an Examples/Gallery section showing 6 sample wishes covering different tones and relationships, with a tone filter that updates the displayed examples.

Add a Templates section (MVP) that displays 8 selectable card templates: Minimal, Cute, Luxury, Anime, Neon, Classic, Aesthetic, Funny. Selecting a template changes the styling used to preview the generated wish and is also used by the “Download as Card Image” export.

Add a Pricing section with clearly presented tiers: Free (text generation + copy/share) and Pro (unlimited templates + export card image + premium styles), plus a “Future” subsection listing voice wishes and video slideshow as future features (non-functional).
Add an FAQ section covering: privacy, how it works, language support, and how to share. Content must be in English.
Add a Footer with Privacy Policy, Terms, and Contact links/sections. Provide simple on-page sections or anchor links (no external dependencies required).

Keep the app fast and offline-friendly by avoiding external API calls for core functionality and ensuring the app works without network access after being loaded once. All generation logic must be local.
Add a built-in set of selectable birthday card background images (a small gallery) that can be used as the background for the card preview and the exported PNG card.
Store the generated birthday card background images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the UI and export logic by file path.

Update the template selection UI to visually display the birthday card background images as selectable thumbnails (in addition to, or replacing, the current gradient-only previews) and clearly indicate the currently selected background.

Update the card export implementation to render the selected birthday card background image onto the canvas before drawing text and branding, while preserving the existing text wrapping and downloadable PNG behavior.

Implement a user login/logout UI using the existing Internet Identity authentication hook, and present it to users as the app’s Google-based login alternative (since direct Google OAuth is not supported in this stack).
Display basic authenticated user info in the UI after login, using the active identity principal as the user identifier, and keep the app usable when not logged in.
Add a minimal backend method to verify authentication wiring by returning the caller principal, and ensure the frontend can call it using the authenticated actor when logged in.

Enforce a gated flow so users must be authenticated (Internet Identity) before they can generate birthday wishes or use generator actions (Generate, Surprise Me, Copy All, Share on WhatsApp). If the user is not signed in, keep the generator section visible but disabled and show a clear inline message prompting the user to sign in.

Add a required plan-selection step after login: authenticated users must select a plan (Free or Pro) before generator actions become enabled. Store the selected plan locally and show the currently selected plan in the UI.

Update the Pricing section so its plan CTAs function as plan selection controls: clicking the Free CTA selects Free; clicking the Pro CTA selects Pro. The UI must clearly indicate the selected plan state and provide a way to proceed to generation (e.g., scroll to the generator after selection).

Ensure Hero section primary CTA ("Generate Wish") respects the gated flow: if the user is not logged in, it should prompt sign-in instead of scrolling directly into an unusable generator; if logged in but no plan selected, it should scroll to Pricing and prompt plan selection; otherwise it scrolls to the generator and focuses the Name input.
Add a top-left corner credit label that reads exactly "Created By Arion Zi" in the top bar of the Hero section, aligned opposite the existing authentication controls.

Apply a UI polish pass to make the website look more professional by improving consistency of spacing, typography hierarchy, and alignment across major sections (Hero, Generator, Templates, Pricing, Examples, FAQ, Legal, Footer) without changing any existing feature behavior or gated-flow logic.

Remove the login/plan gating barrier for core wish generation so that anonymous users can generate and use generator actions (Generate Wish, Surprise Me, Copy All, Share on WhatsApp) without signing in or selecting a plan, while keeping the app functional for authenticated users.

Upgrade the Hero section to include (1) an animated emotional tagline that reads exactly “Create birthday wishes that feel handwritten and personal.”, (2) a small demo preview card showing a sample generated wish under the hero content, and (3) trust badges for “Free AI Generator”, “Instant Results”, and “Multi Language Support”, while keeping the existing “WishMint AI” title and premium dark gradient look.

Add two new generator controls: a Wish Length slider and an Emoji Level slider, and incorporate them into local template-based generation so the generated outputs vary based on these settings (longer/shorter content and more/fewer emojis).
Enhance the Output section so each of the 5 output cards includes both a Copy button and a Share button, and add smooth, subtle interaction animations for output cards and actions.

Add an “Instagram Story” export format option for card downloads in addition to the existing square export, and gate card image download/export behind authentication as a premium/advanced feature (anonymous users can still generate and share text).
Implement a local, offline QR code generator feature as a social/viral tool, allowing users to generate a QR code from shareable content derived from the generated wish pack (no external QR APIs).

Add a new “Features” (feature explanation) section that uses icons and short English descriptions for: AI Emotional Writing, Memory Based Wishes, Instant Share Tools, Multi Language Support, and Personal Tone Customization.
Add a Testimonials section with clearly labeled demo/fake testimonials (English) to improve trust, styled consistently with the existing premium theme.
Apply SEO improvements by setting the document meta title to "WishMint AI – AI Birthday Wish Generator" and meta description to "Generate emotional, funny, romantic AI birthday wishes instantly.".
Update the footer and on-page link targets to include an “About WishMint AI” link/section alongside Privacy Policy, Terms, and Contact, with all user-facing text in English.

Add a “Save Wish” capability as a logged-in advanced feature: authenticated users can save a generated Birthday Pack and view a list of their saved wishes; anonymous users cannot save and are prompted to sign in when they try.
Identify and fix the root cause of the current deployment error so the project can successfully build and deploy to the Internet Computer network.

Add or repair missing/incorrect Internet Computer project configuration required for deployment (for example: canister configuration and frontend asset build integration) so the deployment pipeline has all required files and settings.
Ensure any user-facing error messaging shown during build/deploy troubleshooting (if surfaced in the app UI or logs) is in English and is actionable (states what failed and what to try next).
Implement a pre-login “Demo mode” so anonymous users can try generating a Birthday Pack without signing in or selecting a plan.
Update generator gating logic so authentication/plan gating does not block Demo mode, while keeping existing authenticated flows intact.
Add a demo-friendly onboarding experience that pre-fills the generator with a realistic example and generates outputs automatically when Demo mode is started.
Gate advanced/auth-only actions appropriately during Demo mode and show clear English prompts when an action requires sign-in.
Ensure the Hero section’s prompts and CTAs support the pre-login demo flow in addition to sign-in.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create mobile-first single-page layout with dark premium theme, neon (purple+green) accents, responsive typography/cards, and subtle fade/slide animations
Hero section with title/subtitle and CTAs (Generate Wish, See Examples)
Generator form with required Name + optional Your Name, dropdowns (relationship, tone, language, personality), optional memory line, and validation
Template-based wish generation producing 5 outputs (Main Wish, WhatsApp Short, Instagram Caption, Mini Speech 10–15s, Hashtags)
Output UI: 5 cards each with Copy button, plus Copy All and Share on WhatsApp actions
Implement WhatsApp sharing via wa.me link with encoded combined text
Surprise Me button to randomize inputs and generate
Download as Card Image feature using HTML canvas rendering of selected template + generated wish
Examples/Gallery section with 6 sample wishes and tone filter
Templates section showing 8 selectable card templates (Minimal, Cute, Luxury, Anime, Neon, Classic, Aesthetic, Funny) and applying selection to display
Pricing section: Free vs Pro, plus Future roadmap (voice wishes, video slideshow)
FAQ section covering privacy, how it works, language support, and sharing
Footer with Privacy Policy, Terms, and Contact links/sections
Deliver complete working offline-friendly single index.html with modular JS functions and brief local run instructions; no external API keys
Add built-in birthday card images/backgrounds (a small gallery of selectable card image designs) to use in the card preview/export
Add a login/authentication system using Google (Google Sign-In / OAuth)
Improve overall UI polish to make the website look more professional (refine typography, spacing, alignment, consistency)
Add a top-left corner credit label/text: “Created By Arion Zi”
Remove login barrier for initial generation: allow users to generate the first wish without signing in; require login only for saving wishes, premium template exports, and other advanced features
Hero improvements: animated emotional tagline, mini demo preview of a generated wish under hero, and trust badges (Free AI Generator, Instant Results, Multi Language Support)
Enhance generator inputs with Wish Length slider and Emoji Level slider (in addition to name/relationship/tone/language/personality/memory)
Output cards: add per-card Share button (alongside Copy) and smooth animations for card interactions
Card Template Studio: selectable styles (Cute, Luxury, Minimal, Anime, Aesthetic, Neon) and generate downloadable shareable birthday poster/image using selected style
Add Feature Explanation section with icons and short descriptions (AI Emotional Writing, Memory Based Wishes, Instant Share Tools, Multi Language Support, Personal Tone Customization)
Add social/viral features: Instagram Story download format and QR code generator for sharing
Add Testimonials section (demo/fake testimonials for now) to increase trust
SEO improvements: add meta title "WishMint AI – AI Birthday Wish Generator" and meta description "Generate emotional, funny, romantic AI birthday wishes instantly."
Footer update: include About WishMint AI link/section in addition to Privacy Policy, Terms, and Contact
Add ability to save generated wishes for logged-in users (as a gated advanced feature)
Add a pre-login demo system so users can try the app (demo generation/preview) before authentication is required for advanced features
